entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:41 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 06:41 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High zero.
